description.narrative: Project by Zambia Council for Social Development (ZCSD). Project is the civil society component of an EU funded BBC WST project (75%). The remaning 25% top up funds are provided from FLC. Project links media and civil society as watchdogs on the local gov ernment level. Project would build on ZCSD previous work on Local Governance Barometer and Citizen?s Report Cards in the sample districts and further build networks of citizen journalists and listening groups who will feed into the programming, articulatin g the needs and concerns of local communities, demanding responsiveness and accountability from local government. Project has strong capacity building component and backstopping by BBC WST. ZCSD is a well established network organisation with more than 100 members. Good links from the community level to the international level.
